entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 03:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: N 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 1. Forecast issued 11:42 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
